title: private browsing window is a different color now
content:
After an update today, private browsing windows now are a different color than the other windows. I don't want them to be a different color. How do I change them back to the same as the other windows?

Also, how do I remove the extra text label next to the private mode icon, and just generally put things back to the way they used to look?
creator: PAGulley

title: How can I delete the "set up in seconds" tab that pops up everytime I open Mozilla Firefox?>
content: Every time I open the Firefox browser, the "set up in seconds" page pops up. How can I get rid of that tab? I have my own home tab. Even after I went through the set up instructions, I keep getting this tab. I'm running Windows 10 on a Dell laptop.
creator: lea6

title: Latest version 106.0.1 (64-bit) breaks Amazon Prime
content:
After the latest update Version 106.0.1 (64-bit) , Amazon Prime player no longer displays the control overlay. There is no way to make the playback full screen or access any of the other play settings. Im on Windows 10 Home version 21H2. I tried using Chrome to access Prime, and the playback overlay works as normal, so the problem is not with Amazon, but with Firefox. Please fix.

And I did try clearing the browser cache and logging out/in to Amazon - before anyone wastes time recommending those attempts to fix this.
creator: darweb2

title: Secondary E-mail When Locked Out of Primary Account
content:
I am locked out of my primary Mozilla account because the authentication code disappeared from my authentication app and I misplaced the recovery code. So as recommended, I tried to create a new account with another e-mail because of this mishap. However, that second e-mail address was apparently associated with the primary Mozilla account, because I receive a prompt that I must "sign in using the primary account" when I try to create the account using the second e-mail . Is there a way to disassociate the secondary e-mail from the primary account so I don't have to create a 3rd e-mail address for a new account?

Thank you
creator: 4mnmnms

title: Dissapearing email
content:
Lately when I get email with attachments or over 300k in size I will click the link to download the rest of the message like usual, and the whole thing disappears! No trace of it in inbox, trash, spam filter.... nowhere! It just disappears.

This is a recent thing. 

 I have use Mozilla since it was brand new Netscape.   please help

yours scott
creator: scottg

title: Firefox trying to donload a file on everytime it launches
content: Firefox is trying to download a potentially malicious file everytime it opens. I've tried to remove the file from the download history but it keeps coming back. Anyone have a solution?
creator: pixldhamster

title: After the automatic update (Using 106.0.1) clicking Recently Closed Tabs or Recently Closed Windows does nothing
content: Is this a known issue for the new update? Whenever I try to click Recently Closed Windows in particular, it just does nothing. It has the grey highlighted bar that shows it wants to do something, but then does nothing. About 1 out of 100 times when i click Recently Closed Tabs, it WILL open to show my recently closed tabs, but generally does the same thing as Recently Closed Windows. I know I have recently closed tabs because I restored session and it is currently showing all my old tabs I had open prior to the update. I also tested to see if my recently closed had just reset by opening a new window and closing it, but it still just does nothing. I use the Recently Closed Windows quite a bit and it's quite irritating that it appears to be broken.
creator: illyasviel101

title: BitDefender Central website will not load
content: Having trouble logging in to BitDefender central website.When I enter my information it keeps going back and asking over for same information again. I check to make sure it was all correct but it keeps doing it. I delete cache and cookies but still get same results. Please help. It works in Chrome but not Firefox.
creator: adrinicmano

title: can't delete messages with new update
content: I can no longer delete messages with the Delete key or the context menu for my POP mail since the new update. Gmail works great but comcast messages are impossible to delete. Please help me. Martha
creator: mechampion

title: How to preserve the order of the opened tabs when opening all synced tabs
content:
Hi, I'm migrating to a new PC and followed the below article to open all my currently synced tabs from the old machine on my new one: https://support.mozilla.org/bm/questions/1357426

The issue is that the on the new machine when I open all synced tabs, the order is reversed, i.e. my latest tabs that are on the right on the old machine are now on the left in my new machine. How do I tell open all tabs to keep the same order in the new machine? Any help is greatly appreciated..!

Thanks! manoja
creator: manoja
